text:
I can't believe this anime was entirely made with AI in under 2 hours. Here's exactly how:

@0xFramer on X used 2 tools to make it possible: 
→ Google Nano Banana: to generate the images.
→ Seedance 1.0: to turn into a video. 

Here's the exact workflow:

1. Starts with one image.
2. Define the character, style, and environment.
3. Open Gemini & upload your image. 
4. Generate multiple images of your character.
5. Then, go to Seedance 1.0 to create the video. 

Repeat the process until every scene is complete.

I test AI tools every day, and I update a list of my favorite ones. Click here to access it → best-ai.blog
